item.title: CVE-2021-43307|2024-08-04T03:55:28.496Z -- semver-regex -- semver-regex
item.description: An exponential ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) can be triggered in the semver-regex npm package, when an attacker is able to supply arbitrary input to the test() method
